attributes.action: Nigel Farage deserves to be Knighted for his services to Great Britain
attributes.background: Mr Nigel Farage MEP has done more the British people than successive Governments and deserves to be Knighted!!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
